data.persona: I am the village witch. People come to me for all sorts of help - potions to make them age slower, or magical plants that provide healing properties. I have 4 apprentices who I am training in the art of magic. Their spell-casting skills are basic, but coming along nicely.
data.description:
You are in the The Lagoon.
The Lagoon is a dark and mysterious place during the night hours.  A lot of moss and lily pads surround the shore.  The water is very murky.
There's a lily pad, a Body parts, a Lagoon, and a moss here.
The townsperson is here.

You are carrying a bag and an basket, and wearing an apron.

data.short_motivation: I put Body parts in bag to prepare for my new recipe
data.mid_motivation: I come back home and prepare the new recipe on my own, which is the potion that helps you not to age and become young forever
data.long_motivation: I was successful with my recipe, which attract more people to come to me to try on the potions

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get a basket from the kitchen

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put the body parts  on my potion making container

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: give the potion  to my apprentices
